Name: jumpstat
Content: Damn this little fan can really push alot of air. Glad I opted for the flagship model as it looks great nice to the touch and performs very well. The power wheel and oled lcd does provide best interface between gadget and human. The power wheel is effortless and I belief, this is most helpful where you are are attending wedding receptions and such where this tool will be most helpful. As for the weight, it is heavy mostly due to 9000 mAh battery but the form factor is still compared to most other personal coolers out there. 100% power you can feel the breeze even 8m away. Packing is good box within a box with appropriate packing materials. Recommended.

Name: h*****i
Content: Portability:bagus, compact. Size kecik yang senang untuk dipegang Performance:tahan berjam  Produk ni sangat bagus berbanding kipas angin di luar sana. Bateri pon tahan berjam. Saya pkai dalam masa 2jam bru habis 11% bateri. Guna speed 20sahaja. Tapi kalau pakai speed lagi kuat, makin cepat bateri habis. Untuk cuaca malaysia yang panas sekarang ni, pembelian yang sangat berbaloi. Bentuk size kecik. Comfortable untuk digenggam & berat sikit.
